titles: A True relation from Rome, of a bloody and cruel monster, that for many years hath destroyed an infinite number of men, women and children, devoured the growth of that country, and reduced other nations to  want vvith a description of its prodigious shape, terrifying aspect, and fox-like craftiness, the like never yet seen in any other part of the world.
notes: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Cambridge University Library.
